content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position z1)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position a1)
- Inserter (position b1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position c1) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position a1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, you need 2 iron-plates to craft 1 iron gear wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
